Posts.EditableText: I am trying to make it where the room name is not seen by a player upon entering for character creation purposes.  I know it can be done but I don't know how.  I tried the outputoff command but that didn't work.  Any suggestions?
Posts.HTML: I am trying to make it where the room name is not seen by a player upon entering for character creation purposes.  I know it can be done but I don't know how.  I tried the outputoff command but that didn't work.  Any suggestions?

Posts.EditableText: [code:1ybwz9c4]alias <>[/code:1ybwz9c4] pop that in the room definition.
Posts.HTML:
alias <>
pop that in the room definition.
